europeana:record.dc:title: Carinichremylus gen. nov. (Hymenoptera: Braconidae: Pambolinae) from Peru
Zoologische Mededelingen
europeana:record.dc:creator: Achterberg, van C.
europeana:record.dc:subject: Insecta
Hymenoptera

europeana:record.dc:description: A new genus of the subfamily Pambolinae (Braconidae) is reported from Peru (Carinichremylus gen. nov.; type species: Carinichremylus peleopodae spec. nov.), illustrated and described. The type species has been reared from a Peleopoda spec. (Lepidoptera: Oecophoridae). The new genus is closely related to the Australian genus Chremylomorpha Belokobylskij, 1986. A new genus of the subfamily Pambolinae (Braconidae) is reported from Peru (Carinichremylus gen. nov.; type species: Carinichremylus peleopodae spec. nov.), illustrated and described. The type species has been reared from a Peleopoda spec. (Lepidoptera: Oecophoridae). The new genus is closely related to the Australian genus Chremylomorpha Belokobylskij, 1986.
